name: ALUS_X.cmd
description:
Play as ALUS_X.cmd, a program created to protect the Code against all threats!

Fight against bugs, viruses, and trojans in their relentless waves of attacks!

Bugs are simple programs that will take a part of the Code away. Viruses will spawn bugs and move around the screen. Trojans have special modules that can disable ALUS_X.cmd momentarily.

This game was created for the Summer Slow Jam for June
